SELECT T.TIME_SLOT, NVL(D.CNT, 0) AS SUM_COUNT FROM ( SELECT LPAD(LEVEL - 1, 2, '0') AS TIME_SLOT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 24 ) T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTR(LOG_DT, 9, 2) AS HOUR_SLOT, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM USR_LOGINFO WHERE LOG_DT LIKE #{yyyyMMdd} || '%' AND LOG_CD IN ('IN', 'OUT')
AND 1 = 0
GROUP BY SUBSTR(LOG_DT, 9, 2) ) D ON T.TIME_SLOT = D.HOUR_SLOT ORDER BY T.TIME_SLOT
